doc:
Stephanie Longfellow https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephanie_Longfellow 0 Stephanie Longfellow was an American stage and film actress who appeared in ca. 40 silent films between 1909 and 1911. Longfellow was a popular ingenue for D.W. Griffith, and starred in 16 of his short films. She also starred in films of Mack Sennett and Frank Powell. In 1909, the Dubuque Telegraph-Herald called Longfellow a star of "singular beauty and charm." She was the grand-niece of the poet Henry Wadsworth Longfellow. Stephanie_Longfellow was an_American_stage_and_film_actress who appeared in ca._40_silent_films between 1909_and_1911 . Longfellow was a_popular_ingenue for D.W._Griffith , and starred in 16 of his_short_films . She also starred in films of Mack_Sennett and Frank_Powell . In 1909 , the_Dubuque_Telegraph-Herald called Longfellow a_star of " singular_beauty_and_charm . " She was the_grand-niece of the_poet_Henry_Wadsworth_Longfellow .
